author: craigmcc
msg: Document the procedure for creating your own JNDI resource factories.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a description of the "Generic JavaBean" JNDI resource factory.  This
can be used when you want to return new instances of preconfigured beans
when a lookup() operation is performed, where the bean's properties can
be customized by suitable entries in "conf/web.xml".

msg: Remove TODOs and flesh out the overview of the Server Configuration Reference.
